AD_CaveInDestroyed.synopsis: Elder Brithvar comments when cave-in is destroyed. Remarks on how it's time he killed Nere if player took mutiny quest.

AD_CaveInDestroyed_0.speaker: Elder Brithvar
AD_CaveInDestroyed_0.text: Finally. Time Nere met the pointy end of my war pick.

AD_CaveInDestroyed_1.speaker: Elder Brithvar
AD_CaveInDestroyed_1.text: About time. Looks like payday's coming!
